name: Reset Rush (Digital)
description:
Reset Rush is a game where you collect weapons and abilities to prepare yourself for combat against other people.  Right now it's a local co op with 2 players but I plan to add more of the game in due time.  I thought it would be fun to turn the board game into a digital version so this is the 1 month prototype of the game.  Focused on the core functions before more UI refinement.
Art is placeholder.
Feedback is welcome!
